about.subtitle: Some words about us
about.title: About Us
about.description: The International Company for Printing and Packaging Materials (IPP) is an Egyptian joint stock company established in 1991. Since then, it has grown to become one of the leading companies in the packaging industry in Egypt and is considered one of the top 5 companies in the field. The company specializes in the production and printing of rolls and polyethylene, which are essential materials in the packaging industry. IPP plays a vital role in meeting the needs of many industries in Egypt, including food, beverages, pharmaceuticals, and others.
about.calipoDescription: IPP Egypt is distinguished by its Calipo production line, the first of its kind in Egypt serving the ice cream sector, featuring a Calipo forming machine.
